metadata.description: AI-assisted development workflow skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: deep-dive
plugins.description: Structured workflow for complex tasks: research (gather information) → innovate (explore solutions) → plan (create implementation steps). Use for any non-trivial development task.

plugins.name: github-workflow
plugins.description: AI-assisted GitHub issue management: plan issues with deep-dive workflow, implement approved plans, create issues from conversations, and consolidate discussions.
